description: FAIRFIELD: REZ-2024-100950 Lory Markham for Joseph B McCutcheon Jr: Request to amend proffers accepted with C-72C-83 on Parcel 805-737-7793 located on the west line of Valley Side Drive at its intersection with Farm Creek Drive. The existing zoning is R-3AC One-Family Residence District (Conditional).
